code: import*as React from'react';import Platform from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Platform";import CheckboxIOS from"./CheckboxIOS";import CheckboxAndroid from"./CheckboxAndroid";import CheckboxItem from"./CheckboxItem";import{withTheme}from"../../core/theming";var Checkbox=function Checkbox(props){return Platform.OS==='ios'?React.createElement(CheckboxIOS,props):React.createElement(CheckboxAndroid,props);};Checkbox.Item=CheckboxItem;Checkbox.Android=CheckboxAndroid;Checkbox.IOS=CheckboxIOS;export default withTheme(Checkbox);
